name: Michael Galleck
description: Mike Galleck was anetrunnerand a friend ofTed Collins. At some point he rentedUnit 1242at theMotelon Martin Street,Northside, and converted it into his hideout and netrunning den. In2077Mike was supposed to lay low after a gig he did for Collins. However, he soon received an offer of good pay in exchange for help in a job, which involved digging up dirt on an unnamedcouncilmember. Mike later had an argument about it with Ted, as he was worried for the netrunner's safety. However, their call got cut short when somebody arrived at Mike's hideout.That day he disappeared without a trace and his...
